title: MICHAEL KORS COLLECTION
subtitle: Mini Series
description: Honey, we shrunk the Hamilton. Crafted from smooth leather, this statement-making micro version of our Hamilton Legacy bag features a structured handle and chain-link pendant for decorative appeal. Tote your lipstick and card case in the fully-lined interior.

title: MICHAEL KORS COLLECTION
subtitle: On a High
description: The newest platform in our active portfolio, the Kit trainer balances a modern look with a retro Y2K vibe. Built on a slim running profile, it is animated by a bubble heel insert and finished with a mesh overlay that creates a performance-inspired aesthetic. Designed for all-day comfort, this is an elevated take on an athletic sneaker that works 24/7.
